author: ajsutton
content:
Yes which is why I think we need to fix the incentive to punish late blocks by ensuring they get excluded from the chain (at least). 
And we shouldn’t be designing our apis to encourage bad behaviour like proposing late.

author: ajsutton
content:
To be more explicit the real issue is that currently the last possible moment is just before the end of the slot. We need the last possible moment to be at or very slightly after the start of the slot instead. 
Publishing at the last possible moment isn’t directly the problem, it’s when that last moment is.
